entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
